changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Baseline", "Regular follow up visit", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "LB, Type of visit");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to LB, Type of visit

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_reference_term where code in ("MSFF97","MSFF99","MSFF98","MSFF100") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "MSFOCP" and retired =0 );
